column3: Latest; Phnom Penh: A electrical wire fire broke out at about 11am on April 16
column4: 2020 near Boeung Keng Kang High School
column5: Street 71 in Boeng Keng Kang I
column7: Phnom Penh.------People who lived near the scene said they saw smoke and flames coming from the electric pole. They took around20 fire extinguishers
column8: but as the fire continued to intensify
column9: they reported to local authorities. Two trucks and firefighters intervened with water cannons to extinguish the flames. ------PPR
